title: Riding on bicycles
context: ยง291C-143 Riding on bicycles. (a) A person propelling a bicycle shall not ride other than upon or astride a permanent and regular seat attached thereon. (b) No bicycle shall be used to carry more persons at one time than the number for which it is designed and equipped. [L 1971, c 150, pt of ยง1; am L 1976, c 148, ยง3; am L 1978, c 175, ยง12]
